html:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA GROUP PLC - UPDATE RE CFIUS CLEARANCE *AVEVA - PARTIES TO ACQUISITION ( PARTIES) WILL ENTER INTO A NEW PERIOD OF UP TO 45 DAYS TO ALLOW MORE TIME FOR REVIEW AND DISCUSSION WITH CFIUS *AVEVA - PARTIES AND CFIUS WILL CONTINUE TO WORK TO FINALISE AN AGREEMENT RELATED TO ACQUISITION.


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 28-JAN-202115:57:45 GMT
